trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition> of each branch is determined before the branch is run.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>決定每個分支會先執行分支。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>

trans-unit.source: The first IfElseBranchActivity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> that evaluates to `true` is run.
trans-unit.target: 在第一個 IfElseBranchActivity<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>會評估為`true`執行。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref>類別使用的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> object reference for the current branch activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref>物件參考目前分支活動。

trans-unit.source: The evaluation of this condition returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: 此條件的評估傳回值，指出這個分支是否應該執行。

trans-unit.source: This property is optional on the last <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> and required in other cases.
trans-unit.target: 這是選擇性於最後一個屬性<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>中<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>而在其他情況下的 必要項目。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref>傳回值，指出這個分支是否應該執行。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*> property.
